attributes.title: Horrific thing I saw 😭
attributes.review: I saw a big round orange as soon as I open this crusty app and I’m just horrifically scared and afraid that this man/orange/Cheeto puff will be in my nightmares. Also I saw and EVEN MORE horrified picture of this Cheeto puff of a man getting more cheese put on his round body 😭😭☹️with no clothes on 😢 I neverrrrrrr want anyone to experience this in their life. I wish this upon no one.😔

attributes.title: Definitely needs work
attributes.review: I thought this app would support the black lives matter movement and defunding the police to help minorities communities become better places to live and have better education. All I saw was Donald trump who just wants to start a race war. He is also a white supremacist so who would have guessed.

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: As a MAGA cult member, I was so excited to find this app. However, upon opening the application, I am now left blinded. I am very upset trump did not have a warning before showing a picture of an ugly Cheeto puff and my poor eyes have had to suffer the consequences. Hopefully trump administration can fix this concern in the next update. Trump 2020🇱🇷

attributes.title: Traumatizing
attributes.review: Honestly this administration has been horrendous in every sense of the words. This man is a liar and a bully and a terrible leader. An absolute disgrace to this country. I can’t see anyone using this app in an informed state of mind. Trump does nothing but lie to the American people to gain support and those who support him have been lied to. This app MUST be shut down ASAP.

attributes.title: absolutely ATROCIOUS
attributes.review: So I decided to download the app for trump’s rallies and after taking over an HOUR I was already unimpressed. Cheeto head can’t even make a fast app? Disappointed but not surprised. When I first opened it I was mortified by trump’s tanning photos! Since when did I sign up for an only fans?? 0 stars for his lil peen. very small and wrinkly.

Don’t download this it LITERALLY took forever to download and I even have to throw the trash and clean my room take care of my puppy and it was still downloading but I waited and I got in it looked soooo glitchy I hate it it looked like I was hacked Don’t download this unless you whant to wait forever to download and looks like you got hacked. !!

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app is horrible once’s I opened it there was a naked Cheeto and all my stuff got hacked. I don’t even understand why this allowed to be on the App Store. I don’t even what to put it as a one star this is like negative 5 . This is terrible. Cause then once I found out my stuff got hacked I passed out . This is disgusting

attributes.title: cheeto
attributes.review: when i downloaded this app i was expecting it to be a loving place for me to pay my respects to big cheeto but oh little did i know when i opened it i was forever scared by the cheeto himself twerking yes you read right there was a video of  the big cheeto himself twerking when i opened the app and i will FOREVER be scared well that’s all 🤮😡😖😣

attributes.title: omg chile no........👁👄👁
attributes.review: first of all i downloaded this app and it kept on glitching so i deleted it and it kept glitching over and  over again, so i called support and the first question they asked me was my race!! like WHAT so i asked them what for and they just kept asking me until i told them i was hispanic and they just hung up! WORST APP ON THE APP STORE!! 🤡🙈✨

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: Mia Khalifas bath water was less disgusting than this. My eyeballs feel like they just got ran over by 27 garbage trucks and I’m currently stuck on the side of the highway. I tired to find a good hole to curl up and die in but I couldn’t find any. The trumpkin can go live in the middle of the Atlantic Ocean for all I care. This Cheeto has ruined Cheeto puffs for me.
